Labels.org.cogmodel.config: {"build":{"gpu":true,"python_version":"3.8","python_packages":["torch==1.10.1","torchvision==0.11.2","torchaudio==0.10.1","trimesh==3.9.8","numpy==1.21.0","pyhocon==0.3.57","icecream==2.1.0","opencv_python==4.5.2.52","tqdm==4.50.2","scipy==1.7.0","PyMCubes==0.1.2","pymeshlab==2022.2.post2"],"run":["pip install --upgrade pip","pip install ftfy regex tqdm git+https://github.com/openai/CLIP.git smplx[all] chumpy dotmap PyYAML ninja tensorboard scikit-image","pip install git+https://github.com/nghorbani/human_body_prior.git","pip install git+https://github.com/nghorbani/body_visualizer.git","pip install tensorboard scikit-image","pip install gdown","gdown --id 1krWnGpL1Pj6Q_0DzJZ0zFbxMc41U5K6_ \u0026\u0026 unzip smpl.zip \u0026\u0026 mv smpl smpl_data","gdown --id 1ae-pnDhzOG3brxBfU1lBq8CyOKz4rnzd","unzip /avatarclip_data.zip","apt-get update","apt-get -y install curl gnupg","curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_16.x  | bash -","apt-get -y install nodejs","npm install -g obj2gltf","mkdir fbxpythontmp \u0026\u0026 cd fbxpythontmp \u0026\u0026 gdown --id 15I6vdysb2Sgam-zC11ARdvenp07MEGBJ \u0026\u0026 tar -xzvf fbxpythonsdk.tar.gz \u0026\u0026 cp -rv * /usr/local","apt-get install -y git","apt-get install -y build-essential libbz2-dev libssl-dev libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev tk-dev","apt-get install -y libpng-dev libfreetype6-dev","wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.6.8/Python-3.6.8.tar.xz","tar -xvf Python-3.6.8.tar.xz","cd Python-3.6.8 \u0026\u0026 ./configure \u0026\u0026 make install","python3.6 -m pip install --upgrade pip \u0026\u0026 python3.6 -m pip install \"torch==1.10.1\" \"torchvision==0.11.2\" \"torchaudio==0.10.1\" trimesh==3.9.8 pyhocon==0.3.57 icecream==2.1.0 opencv_python==4.5.2.52 tqdm==4.50.2 scipy PyMCubes==0.1.2 pymeshlab","python3.6 -m pip install open3d smplx chumpy"],"system_packages":["ffmpeg","zip"],"cuda":"11.1.1","cudnn":"8"},"predict":"predict.py:Predictor"}
